content.data:
[Y]Variables
[W]Named boxes for game state.
[c][m.]
[W]Use clear names for score, lives and
[W]level so logic reads like plain
[W]speech.
[W]Set default values at startup to avoid
[W]mysterious behaviour later.
[c][m.]
[G]- Pick clear names.
[G]- Set initial values.
[G]- Print while testing.
[m][m-]
[Y]BEGINNER TIP
[C]Good names are free documentation.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
